You will probably see your 
own community midwife, 
or named midwife from a 
CoMC team, for most of your 
antenatal care. You may be 
offered	a	visit	at	the	hospital	
for an initial assessment and 
perhaps for an ultrasound 
scan or for special tests. 
Sometimes your midwife may 
visit you at home.
